original_title: さらば青春の光 森田哲矢 制作総指揮 ペンション殺●事件【圧倒的4K映像でヌク！】 川村ゆい
overview: In the video, this pension in the mountains gets shut down because of a storm and everyone is stuck. Then, a female customer got murdered and everyone was suspicious of everyone as they try to figure out who is the culprit.
title: Farewell to the light of youth Tetsuya Morita Executive Producer Pension Murder Case
